recommendation.title: using your local core
recommendation.description: you may proceed with the public node if you wish, but we strongly recommend using your local node for the best experience.
recommendation.subTitle: advantages of using a local node:
recommendation.publicExplanation: The public node you connect to is actually a privately operated node that has been made publicly accessible. While convenient, it comes with certain limitations compared to running your own.
